channel.title: NYE on SANTI'S MEMEX
channel.description: Recent content in NYE on SANTI'S MEMEX

item.title: End of 2021: Reflections
item.description: As we head into 2022 (Minus Betty White, RIP) I’m thinking more and more about the movie, Aniara. I’m also moving to Boston in March, and besides all the work involved, I’m more hesitant about putting together a portfolio than about the work involved in moving. I guess I have anxiety about putting work out there, which from my recent understanding, is not uncommon in people who aren’t traditional university grads.
